Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.Player_and_Board

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Player_and_Board.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cell extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single cell on the game board.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell()
      Constructs a cell with default properties. By default, the cell state is set to NOTPLACEABLE and visited is set to false.

    • getVisited

      public boolean getVisited()
      Checks if the cell has been visited.
      Returns:
      true if the cell has been visited, false otherwise.

    • setVisited

      public void setVisited(boolean visited)
      Sets the visited status of the cell.
      Parameters:
      visited - true to mark the cell as visited, false otherwise.
